oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A note on sewage sludge - risk assessments and fertilization value
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Magid, Jakob
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soil quality
Soil
Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A number of recent studies of risk related to agricultural use of sewage sludge are reviewed, as a contribution to the discussion of potential for use in organic agriculture. Furthermore a very tentative assessment of the fertilization value of sewage sludge and its derived products is developed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Magid, Jakob (2013) A note on sewage sludge - risk assessments and fertilization value. IMPROVE-P working paper, no. 1, Plant and Environmental Sciences, Copenhagen University. [Completed]
